bibl.title: Potenziale militare e rappresentanza proporzionale nel koinon beotico. Una riflessione su Hell. Oxy. 16 (11), 2-4.
bibl.note: Suggests that the principles of proportional representation, which appear to animate the Boiotian constitution as portrayed in Hell. Oxy. 16 (11), 2-4, could constitute a boundary to the complete deployment of the actual federal military potential. - Avec résumés en italien et en anglais.
bibl.seg: Alessandro Brambilla, Potenziale militare e rappresentanza proporzionale nel koinon beotico. Una riflessione su Hell. Oxy. 16 (11), 2-4.
Ὅρμος. Ricerche di Storia Antica N.S., 7 (2015) pp. 1-30.

Suggests that the principles of proportional representation, which appear to animate the Boiotian constitution as portrayed in Hell. Oxy. 16 (11), 2-4, could constitute a boundary to the complete deployment of the actual federal military potential. - Avec résumés en italien et en anglais.
